content:
Hi,
I had posted a while ago about the Notepad++ FHIR plugin. At that time STU3 was the current version and the plugin was broken.

I have tested the plugin again, and it appears to be working with STU3, but not with R4. When I attempt to validate a resource, I continue to receive this error:
"Validation Process Failed: Item not found
Item not found"

Is it currently broken with R4, or is something with my install messed up? I tried to test with official FHIR resource examples, and received the same error.

Thanks,
-Josh
